summary.p: Sends the five recently published thesis directories from Wittenberg; will gladly show further gratitude. Greetings.

div.p: Greetings. For the first time, these five tables of propositions have been published here, which I wanted to send to you because I hoped they would be pleasing, and indeed not only in these small matters, but in whatever way I can, I will most gladly show you gratitude. I will write more soon.
In the meantime, fare well. I wish well-being to your entire family, then to Mr. Pellican, Theodor, Amman, Collin, our most kind teachers.
To the most vigilant minister of the word, Mr. Heinrich Bullinger, his most esteemed father.
